---
title: "About"
---

We are the UAlg Science Community, an informal group of UAlg members dedicated to fostering scientific and academic collaboration between UAlg researchers, students, and professors to advance knowledge across disciplines.
We thrive to build a cohesive community, united in science.


### Contact us

We would be thrilled to hear from you. Drop us an email at: science.community.ualg at gmail.com
